name: Style of a Knight, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."

【ACT】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one character with "Shirou(士郎)" or "Saber(セイバー)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: "Saber's Master" Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Anger Towards Evil" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, search your deck for up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards."
flavor_text: I will be your Master.

name: A Knight's Oath, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》characters.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that card's level +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Allow me to renew my vow. So long as there are Command Seals on your body, mine will be your blade.

name: Resolution to Fight Together, Shirou
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock]".

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one ""Saber's Master" Shirou", reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: I've decided to fight as a Master.

name: "Heroic Spirit" Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Resolution to Fight Together, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal a card named ""Heroic Spirit" Saber" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I have come in response to your summons. Master, what is the situation?

name: Resolution Not to Fight, Shirou
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Saber(セイバー)" in its card name, this card gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal a card named ""Heroic Spirit" Saber" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's stock."
flavor_text: These are Gandr shots?! It's different from what I know!

name: Battle with Soichiro, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Armor Release" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +5000 power until end of turn.

name: Shirou in the Morning Glow
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [Put a 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Battle Within the Field, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Resonate [(1) Reveal a card named "Activating a Command Seal, Shirou" in your hand] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Battle After School, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, put this card into your stock.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rin: "You finally came out, eh, Emiya?"

name: Past Hero, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "A Fateful Night" is in your climax area, you may choose one of your other characters, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text:
Rin: "Servants are basically always
with you in spirit form, and should the need arise, you can materialize them and make them fight."

name: Confronting a Servant, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal a card named ""Heroic Spirit" Saber" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text:
Rider: "I'm surprised. You aren't going to use a Command Seal?"
Shirou: "Sorry, I don't have many left."

name: Heading for the Rescue, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal a card named ""Heroic Spirit" Saber" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Assassin: "Even now, you will not
reveal your Noble Phantasm."

name: Mischievous Smile, Taiga
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it into your opponent's stock.
flavor_text: Yay?

name: "Servant" Gilgamesh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 【STAND】 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and 【REST】 it.

name: Kind Soul, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: …man, this place never changes.

name: Archery Club Captain, Mitsuzuri
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3500 power.

【ACT】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] At the beginning of your next draw phase, choose a card named "Archery Club Captain, Ayako" in your memory, put it on any position of your stage, and put the top card of your deck underneath that character as a marker.
flavor_text: Well, I need to go to the faculty room.

name: Commanding Aura, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: At the School Cafeteria, Mitsuzuri
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your draw phase, if you do not have any other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
You're not eating with the student
council president today.

name: Shirou's Close Friend, Issei
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power and the character facing this card gets +1 soul for each of your other "Battle After School, Shirou".
flavor_text:
Emiya, you'd better hurry and eat
before the lunch break ends.

name: Tinkering with Machines, Shirou
flavor_text: It's okay, I'm almost done.

name: During Morning Practice, Mitsuzuri
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck, and your opponent may put the top card of your deck on the bottom of your deck. (If not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text:
Hey, Tohsaka?
You're early today.

name: Usual Morning, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, 【REST】 this card. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavor_text: Morning, Fuji-nee.

name:
Student
Council President, Issei
flavor_text: Tohsaka…

name: Usual Morning, Taiga
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent chooses the number 0 or 1 or 2. Reveal the top card of your deck, and if that card is a card of a level that matches the number that your opponent chose, draw up to X cards. X is equal to the number that your opponent chose +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. If it is not, the revealed card is returned to its original place)

name: Activating a Command Seal, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Return this card to your hand] When a card named "Summoning Saber" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named "Battle Within the Field, Saber" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: That means it's my turn.

name: Servant with Blond Hair
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: There is a sneer on your lips, holy man.

name: Hidden Weapon, Saber
flavor_text:
Lancer: "Your Noble Phantasm, is it a sword?"
Saber: "Perhaps, perhaps not. It may be a battle axe.
Or perhaps it is a polearm."

name: Temporary Rest
ability: Look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Weapon》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your waiting room. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn. Put this card into your clock.
flavor_text: I can also minimize my mana expenditure by sleeping.

name: Self-training
ability: Until end of turn, all of your characters get +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavor_text: Tracing basic structure. Tracing component materials!

name: Armor Release
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Anger Towards Evil
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Summoning Saber
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: Please… Come to me, Saber!

name: "Heroic Spirit" Rider
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, your opponent chooses up to one level 0 or lower character in his or her waiting room, and puts it on the stage position that character was on. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Dancing After School" is in your climax area, you may put that character into your opponent's clock.

ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one green character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Bewitching Beauty, Rider
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put another character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Servant》 characters in front of this card gets +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.

Curse with your dying breath that
you were born with no luck and no power.

ability: 【CONT】 Your other 《Sports》 or 《Weapon》 character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1500 power.

ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Sports》 or 《Weapon》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Bystander, Lancer
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is five or more, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

name: Self-concious, Shinji
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavor_text: Really? I thought you were.

name: Archery Club Vice-captain, Shinji
ability: 【CONT】 Experience This card gets +3000 power for each card named "Self-concious, Shinji" in your level.
flavor_text:
I was wondering what you've been up to after quitting the club. You're the student council
president's errand boy, eh?

name: Moving Like a Beast, Lancer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order.
flavor_text:
If you're a man,
show some dignity, damn it.

name: Usual Morning, Sakura
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)

name: Shinji's Servant, Rider
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

I'm not as na?ve as Shirou Emiya, but there are some things I won't budge on.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, perform the following action. "Choose a character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Rin's Servant, Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

flavor_text: Oh, and this is the most damning. Your appeal is hard to see.

name: Latecomer, Archer
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Master》 or 《Servant》, this card gets +1000 power.

I sensed a threat
to my Master and rushed to her side. It appears I was too late, though.

ability: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal a card named "Proof of Contract, Rin" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. You'll die instantly
if they hit a vital spot!

【AUTO】 Resonate [(1) Reveal a card named "Proof of Contract, Rin" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and put it into your opponent's waiting room.

name: Silver Thread Alchemy Elgen Lied, Illya
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Master》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Attacking without warning? What are you, an animal, Rin?

name: "Heroic Spirit" Assassin
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if this card is in the middle position of the center stage, this card gets +2000 power.
flavor_text:
Kojiro Sasaki,
Assassin-class Servant.

name: "Caster's Master" Soichiro Kuzuki
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You underestimated me, Saber

name: Rin's Classmate, Kane Himuro
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your characters with "Assist"] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Maki, all we need to do is go eat lunch at the cafeteria, right?

name: Overwhelming Violence, Berserker
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put the top card of your deck into your clock, and 【REST】 this card.

name: Lady, Illya
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Illya's Magic, Storch Ritter" is in your climax area and the number of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters is three or more, you may draw up to two cards. If you do, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: It's nice to meet you, Rin. I'm Illya.

name: Hypocritical Courtesy, Kirei
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your draw phase, if you do not have any other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power until the end of turn.
flavor_text:
It is the sixth day since the war commenced. You are the first to have
made his way here.

name: "Finishing" Move, Assassin
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other ""Finishing" Move, Assassin".

【AUTO】 [(1) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two ""Finishing" Move, Assassin", and put them on separate positions of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: Ultimate Technique, Swallow Reversal

name: Tactician, Caster
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Master》 characters in front of this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Heroic Spirit" Caster" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text:
I am leaving
to claim my prize early.

name: Warning Before the Battle, Illya
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card gets +1000 power.".

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to one card named "Warning Before the Battle, Illya" in your hand, reveal it to your opponent, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text: If you don't summon yours soon, you're gonna die, Big Brother.

name: Modern Power, Kirei
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Weapon》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: "Heroic Spirit" Berserker
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a 《Servant》 character from your stage into your clock] （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Rin: "Berserker!?"

name: Rin's Classmate, Yukika Saegusa
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Rin's Classmate, Kane Himuro" and "Rin's Classmate, Kaede Makidera" get +500 power.
【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text:
E-Excuse me, Tohsaka?
If you don't mind, would you like to eat lunch together?

name: "Berserker's Master" Illya
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)

name: Rin's Classmate, Kaede Makidera
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, until end of turn, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavor_text: Didn't I tell you? Tohsaka never brings a boxed lunch.

name: Rule-breaking Noble Phantasm, Caster
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Rule-breaking Noble Phantasm" is in your climax area, choose one trait of a character on your opponent's stage, and until end of turn, all of your opponent's characters lose that trait.
flavor_text: Hmph…

name: Overseer of the Holy Grail War, Kirei
flavor_text: It chooses the Master who is worthy of it.

name: Reticent Teacher, Soichiro Kuzuki
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a ""Caster's Master" Soichiro Kuzuki" from your hand into your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Ryudou, I need to speak to you.

name: Illusion magic
ability: Each player returns all cards in the waiting room to his or her deck. Each player shuffles his or her deck afterwards.
flavor_text: Saber: "Rider-class Servant!"

name: Taken
ability: Choose one of your 【STAND】 《Master》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Saber is now my puppet.

name: Immense Power
ability: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of 《Master》 characters you have.

name: Illya's Magic, Storch Ritter
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text:
Besides, what do you want me to say
to someone who is going to die here?

name: Rule-breaking Noble Phantasm
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text:
I had thought that
you were utterly irrational, but you do understand
your situation, don't you?

name: SD Shirou
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters get +500 power.
flavor_text: I like people like you.

name: SD Saber
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your clock is zero, this card cannot attack.
flavor_text: Give me an order.

name: SD Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: If presented with an enemy that is easy to slay, we ought to do so.

name: SD Rin
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: For starters, good evening, Emiya.

name: The Ones Fighting Against Fate
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another 《Servant》 character, this card gets +1500 power.

name: In an Alliance
ability: 【CONT】 Assist During your turn, all of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Commanding Aura, Saber
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Tinkering with Machines, Shirou
flavor_text: It's okay, I'm almost done.

name: Usual Morning, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, 【REST】 this card. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavor_text: Morning, Fuji-nee.

name: Past Hero, Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "A Fateful Night" is in your climax area, you may choose one of your other characters, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text:
Rin: "Servants are basically always
with you in spirit form, and should the need arise, you can materialize them and make them fight."

name: Kind Soul, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)

【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: …man, this place never changes.

name: Hidden Weapon, Saber
flavor_text:
Lancer: "Your Noble Phantasm, is it a sword?"
Saber: "Perhaps, perhaps not. It may be a battle axe.
Or perhaps it is a polearm."

name: Self-training
ability: Until end of turn, all of your characters get +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavor_text: Tracing basic structure. Tracing component materials!

name: A Fateful Night
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I ask you. Are you my Master?

name: Proof of Contract, Rin
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with "Archer(アーチャー)" in its card name, until end of turn, that character gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a lower level than this card, this card cannot attack."
flavor_text: This is all the proof you need that I am your Master, right?

name: Rough Summoning, Archer
flavor_text: …hm?

name: Dual-wielding Bowman, Archer
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

name: A Different Morning, Rin
flavor_text: I guess it's just one of those days.

name: Summon Rites, Rin
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters.
flavor_text: Close the gates of the four directions. Come forth from the Crown and follow the forked road leading to the Kingdom.

name: Summoning Ritual
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Come forth from the circle of
binding, Guardian of the Scales!

name: A Bowman's Speciality
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(ComeBack@: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Holy Grail War Entry, Saber
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal one card from the top of your deck, and put it into your waiting room. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X soul until end of turn. X is equal to the level of the card put into your waiting room with this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Your Servant Saber has come in response to your summons.

name: Familiar's Work, Archer
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: You are quite the slob, aren't you, girl?

name: For Victory, Rin & Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters is four or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your encore step, if you do not have any other 【REST】 characters in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: Yes, I'm fighting to win. That's all.

name: Jewel Mage, Rin
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage ｆｒｏｍ your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When another of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Say your prayers!

name: Reinforce Magic, Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage ｆｒｏｍ your hand, choose one of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Trace on.
